nodes.title: Add streams acls for consumer group and support for applicationId

mockito-all was abandoned, make use of mockito-core instead.
Add custom plans to help standardise topic config
Make usage of topic key schemas optional, values are always required

add a filter to remove only configs that have been explicitly set

added an option to customise the topic name patterns

Fix problems with the schema registration logic and the relative path findings.
